itemInfo.itemDesc:
A pudding made with extremely suspicious-looking ingredients. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 110 min
 Damage Against Humans +2 for 110 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Oatmeal
item.desc:
A mixture of grain powder and milk. 

- Unique Effect: Recover +5 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map)

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec

item.name: Oatmeal
item.desc:

item.name: Pig Blood
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be extracted from a pig corpse using a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Chicken Meat
item.desc:
An ingredient used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Bartali Farm, Finto Farm

- Usage: Fried Bird, Steamed Bird, etc.

item.name: Pickled Vegetables
item.desc:
Vegetable soaked in vinegar. 
- Unique effect: Gathering Speed Rank +1 for 60min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Refined Oatmeal
item.desc:
Oatmeal made with excellent-quality grains. 

- Unique Effect: Restore +6 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map).

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec
